column1: review

I Just Loved it. One suggestion I want to add I have received accessories while unboxing charger, Headphones, Phone Cover & off course Oppo F11 Pro my phone but one thing which might be in the box it's Tampered Glass guard.which is missing. if it includes the Tampered glass guard too then it's a great product.....I will give 5 star to this product if I found tempered glass guard. Overall I satisfied with the package.

max price max discount with no 100 % satisfaction , the sound input i mean when we taking calls the other persons not able to hear clearly , other persons always repeat once more. is it phone problem or mic problem not sure. other things are good. and little concerned over battery life fast charging is awesome and fast drying not appreciate

Camera quality super awesome ..night photos are far above my expectations.. terrific
Battery life pretty good...
Fast charging great..
Quick delivery..
Had a minor spot on the pre installed screen gaurd.
Little bubble in side edge I guess it's manufacturer fault but dats negligible...
Although face recognition is not secure it can open by your photo also as saw in some YouTube reviews....value for money if bought under 15000

1. The Best Thing Is In this Phone Is Pop Up Selfie...And The Camera Quality Is Just Wow . The 16 MP Front Camera Is Very Powerful Camera ... And The Night Mode Of the Back Camera is The Best for low Light Photograpy..
2. The 4000mah Battery Is Long Lasting...
And The VOOC 3.0 is very fast Just 0 to 100% charge Is in 50 min ...The Charging is super No Need of Type C Charger...
3. Face recognition is very fast in it's quality.
4. Display is Very Bright And The Design Is Very Sexy Design Because Of It's 3 color..
5. The Phone Is Very Fast and the best thing is OPPO GAME SPACE ... which booster your gaming performance...
If U Are confused to buy OPPO F11 PRO OR VIVO V15 PRO .. Then I should go for OPPO f11 pro ...

- Good design
- Good camera
- Excellent full view display
- Gravity censor is just wow....You won't see it in Vivo V15PRO

It's not good not worth no compared to local phone this phone not worth that much amount that's why one month before I purchase 25000 now one month in 21000 prices is down but options is not there so many compared to local phone there are out so many options futures also there near oppo f11 pro not options is there then music system also poor quality

Like the mobile a lot .... Worth buying as per cost...superb battery life and voosh charger is too good super fast charging....finger sensor is awesome (quality wise), as other mobiles with same feature don't recognize my finger but this do....OPPO please give transparent back cover for it as my green color is not visible with the cover you provided.

There is issue with the speaker of the phone , specially when you are on a call , sound is very low and 75% of the talk is inaudible and rest you have to guess.

The only good thing is the selfie camera which is superb . Undoubtedly one of the best selfie camera.

Fingerprint reader is very poor , face recognition also. Some cheap quality material in a high end Phone. Highly unsatisfied with the phone, waste of money.

If you are looking for a phone in range of 20k,then oppo f11 pro will satisfy you more than any other mobile. The rising camera is an added beauty for this mobile which is really stunning in both looks and taking pictures. Battery capacity and stand by time is far better. The notch less display will help you view vidoes with more comfort and negligible interference. The vooc charger provided also works well. We have many mobiles with distinct or same features as this mobile has with a higher price, but apart from all of these OPPO F11 PRO do satisfy you in an affordable price. Thank you OPPO (The Official Indian Cricket Team Sponsor).
When I call someone he/she can't hear me while I can hear clearly her/his voice. Other performance are quit goot

It's definitely not to be called a camera phone. I got this for my wife. And camera is horrible. Pictures are not sharp. Once you zoom the pic you can see picture is full of grains.
I thought Of returning it and buying one plus 6 which is an amazing phone and I am using it since 6 months. But there is no return possible. It can only be replaced. So my honest suggestion - put 10k more and buy one plus 6.
This is a awesome phone.Buy 128gb model is more value for money and it gives additional Rs3000 on exchange
Very bad The phone's color is descending automatically

camera

sensors

Genuinely I fel very good after having this phone , I still need to explore overall very good .. value for money
The camera quality is anyway good as advertised .

I like the sound quality of the speakers very well .

I think Mike quality also should improve a little .

Over all an awesome phone ..
I generally use for games, songs unlike others I rarely take pics .. but still this phone holds good .. the UI and approach are also interactive .

Thanks OPPO team for giving this quality product at a cheaper price .

Writing this after 2 months of ussage. Selfie works good. No lag while playing pubg. Screen feels bigger in hand. Battery backup on heavy ussage lasts at least a day. But I don't any difference in charging speed between my f9pro and f11pro as they promised. Build quality is tuff.

This is one month use review. Quality of camera is excellent. Battery life is also very good. Charging time is very less by voc charger. Sound quality is fine. I got exchange offer with my 2years old lenevo k6 note for an amount of RS. 6300. So for me it's value for money. Recommended

Phone performance is really very good, camera is just mind blowing, speed, charging VOOC 25mins full charge, selfie camera way too good, but received damaged back body twice, replaced once, but received the other one in more bad condition, tried replacing but amazon does not allow second time replacement.

Using the ph since 3 months.
No complains.
I use this for surfing net, YouTube (3 hours), game (1 hour), music, FB, news, calls 3 hours, etc. every day.
Battery back with above will be 1.5 days.
Worth the money.

Highly satisfied with the product but the prices change within 15 days, which makes you little concerned about the deal you are getting is best or a better deal may be available in next week. The product is anyway fantastic with respect to all features. Merger of memory card slot and second SIM slot wasn't expected. Also amazingly the phone of this price range lacks direct video calling facility.

Hi Amazon Team,
My self Altaf Khan from Mumbai I have recently purchased Oppo F11 Pro.
Camera , Screen , Low Light face recognition camera, battery charging and stand by battery hours is just amazing 👌 .
Paisa Vasul Oppo F11 Pro Mobile .

One Advise : Kindly add two sim slot with extra memory card slot in future.

Appreciated to Oppo Mobile for providing amazing mobile phone in India ... Thank you so much ❤️💕.
Bettery is very fast low

AWESOME PHONE...LOVED IT...ITS MY 2ND F11 PRO...FOR MY WIFE....I HAVE PURCHASED 64GB MODEL AT 25K...NOW ITS 128GB AT 24K...IN JUST 1 MONTH..I THINK THIS IS BAD STRATEGY FROM OPPO..NOW I FEEL MY 64GB MODEL PURCHASE WAS TOO EARLY and Feel disappointed...But phone is over all best...but if ur phone is in pocket and vdo call came..pop camera opens in pocket which i think not good..
Nothing to say disliked .. awsum phone must buy and the best and cheapest phone with pop up selfie camera.

Display is super cool. i compared v15 pro and f11 pro both in hands n i felt f11 pro display more crisp and vivid. and rear cam of f11 pro outshines in nightmode specially..
vooc 3.0 charges my phone in 75min.
the only thing i gave 4star is its build quality its color is easily coming out from edges and frame by minor usage and scratches which is plastic so i dont like my new phone's color to come out so soon.

Good phone. All features are good. Processing speed, stunning look, battery charging speed, battery life are good. At price tag oppo should gone for AMOLED display. Also camera performance lags in low light. Redmi Note 7 pro is oppo/vivo killer. Full display with popup selfi saves oppo/vivo from redmi note 7 pro.

This phone is better than vivi v15 pro as it is more faster than snapdragon 660 and the cameras click picture like dslr and oppo gives gorrila glass on the dispay.the charging is more faster than dash charger,overall phone is perfect at this price
High weight and internal configuration not much worthful as per price range.

In love with this new mobile... Cam and other features .. but there is some problem in screen mirroring.. I'm unable to connect it with my lg TV ... Where I used to connect my TV to other brand mobiles... Otherwise it is soo cool .but I'm scared if my PHn slips when my front cam is on .. don't know I feel pop up is interesting but also delicate on other hand...

Camera: In an oppo shared article I read the sensor used in oppo f11 pro is the same Sony sensor IMX586 which they used in Redmi Note 7 pro. Looks like the news is for real. Camera quality from rear and front is top notch. Natural colors, Outstanding details, Perfect HDR shots and a easy friendly camera UI. The pop-up camera technology is too good to see. Its fast and works quietly.
Is not good

I was a little sceptical buying oppo again, having used F1 plus for 3 years, but this just proves oppo has definitely meaning business.

Also one of the security feature no one understands is that camera is hidden away and with all these privacy issues going on,you can be sure that no one is using your phone to look at you, coz camera is all tucked away.

1st of all thank you Amazon for your quuck delivery service. Oppo f11 pro is a very gd phone. Camera is excellent in day & low light. Battery quality is very good. Storage is the only issue in this phone, at the price of 25k oppo only provides 64gb rom & 2nd sim slot is hybrid. Processor should be little bit better at this range. I played pubg without any problem. Smooth as butter. If you get it in any offer which i get in a no cost emi the amount is only 17k with exchanging my 3yrs old phone. Which is a great deal for me. Go for it if u like to click great selfies & photos. Gaming is very good in this phone.
Back up is very poor..even in idle conditions battery draining .. Even no wifi or net connection .. And background apps disable.. Not suitable for backup..

The built is average. Camera is spectacular. Display is a compromise in quality. The back cover provided inside the case is the worst. Unlock speed is superb ( for face unlock and fingerprint ) Overall a good product at the given price range.

I purchased this product by simply paying 15000 Rs on mobile exchange mode. This was the first pruduent thing, I made in my life. The oppo F11 is a beautiful well designed with premium features. Battery is outstanding with fast charging. It took only 1 hour to charge from 0 to 90%. Face recognition is excellent. Screen quality and its durability are quite respectable. Any how the more you ready to pay, the more premium features you can avail. Overall I am completely satisfied with this product.

Excellent product. Recommend for anyone planning to buy budget phone with all the modern facilities barring in display fingerprint. Anyone can sacrifice the in display fingerprint for the fast physical fingerprint and excellent face recognition technology.

Awesome phone. Camera quality is awesome. After full charge battery lasts for a full 24 hr with data usage on. No heating evident in 2 days usage. Smooth functioning, good sound quality,. For a normal user, this mobile is best in its class.

Fabulous phone killer camera Thanks most important Exchange my Old device and Given good Price Battery backup Awesome Big Bhai Charger i dont see Big Charger Before Buying Mai Soch Raha tha 25000 ka mobile le kr Pastana na pade but paisa vasool Mobile

Good camera takes very detailed pictures. No type c port charger but charges very quickly and lost longer. Processing speed is good enough for daily or rough usage. Played pubg on this device with HD graphics with high frame rate for 2 and a half hours and I didn't face any lag hardly faced any frame drop. Gameplay was smooth. While playing pubg, mobile is not getting heated up much and battery also only less than 40 percent consumed for the two and a half hours game play with HD graphics. Overall good phone at this price. Would recommend it.
Awesome phone by oppo amazing experience perfect phone under 25k

The oppo f11 pro is really to beautiful, and also comes with great features but some things is disappointed in this is thats its having 'Hybrid Sim Slot' and little bit heavy. But still there pop camera and sensors making it good, also you never disappointed with there features. And there fast charging work really well. Camera is also fantastic.
100% recommended

But some point to be noted # Oppo India :-
Cons:-
1. Heating issue when surfing the Internet and video call .
2. Back Panel is Easily Scratch-able, Even Dust particle create a big scratch easily. So please cover the back panel through scratch resistance guard.
3. Screen is very good but if oppo provide Amoled panel , it was a super deal for his true followers.
4. Finger print photography not include in colors os 6 . It is Basic feature for any mobile, Please update this feature in next update.
5. Back cover which is provide in the Box is very cheap quality, it is not a dust resistance, Dust particle is always on the back cover. and color is very dull , The beauty of the phone is cover from this cover.
6. you tube notification is not clear from pop up window.
Pros:-
1. Night photo-graphy is ver good in this phone, Night Mode is very good from other device which is in the market.
2. Full screen & bezel less display is Trendy and future of the Mobile industry.
3. pop- up camera is very good to see and pic is super.
4. 48 mp camera is good but if F11 pro use Sony sensor , this phone was one step upper compare to other market.
5. Back Design is superb , it is very good compare to vivo.
6. pop up camera position is very good to see and very pleasant to eyes.
7. fast charging is very fast, vooc is a racket.

Overall phone is very good with latest phenomena of mobile industry.
And I think Heating issue will be solved in future through Software Update.

Thanks
Great Phone
Its like that i purchase the second hand refurbished phone.
Really disappointed with display quality. it gives very cheap feeling, yellowish display looks very warm, unable to set it. Not returnable only replaceable, feeling cheated.
Get heated up very fast

Inside the box we get some paperwork a micro USB cable and a charging brick which is rated at 5V 4A and it's very fast. We also get a silicon case for the phone, so that's good

It has a hybrid SIM slot which means you can add 2 SIM card or 1 SIM+1 SD card. Sadly opportunity has gone with a micro USB slot for charging, at this price point we expect a type C port. It supports VOOC fast charge so it's good.

A great smartphone at this price. The cameras are just amazing and the photos are good and clear, but the low light photography could be improved.

It has a very powerful processor the Helios p70, great for multi-tasking gaming and normal usage. It has 6 gigs of ram, which is enough for 2019 and is also somewhat futureproof

It runs on colour OS 6 based on Android pie which is fast responsive and optimised. And you also get a game space feature which can be use to boost gaming performance and block calls or notifications

Talking about the storage, it has 64 gigs of storage. It's okay but, they should have gone with 128 gigs instead.

Overall it's a great phone with some flaws like micro USB.

.
Have issues with voice recognition, transmission and not audible to the opposite party..

I don't know if I was sent a defective piece or if the camera quality is just like that in this model.. But rear camera is not very good. Selfie camera is working fine with enough light. The rear camera is not up-to the mark. Oppo is marketing this model for lovely low light pictures.. But my one plus 5 that I have used before this was really better than this. Face recognition was fair enough. Battery life is also fair enough. Charge time is fast too. I'm utterly disappointed with the rear camera of the phone.

Pros :
1) Camera good quality
2) Good low light pictures
3) Speed of the phone is good
4) Face recognition is fast
5) Charging is fast and battery lasts longer

Cons :
1) Selfie looks artificial
2) Phone is thicker as compared to other phone in same category (may be because of selfie camera)

Overall, phone is good but in this price band.

Thank you

Switching over from Samsung was very Difficult as I was using for many years. Was very close to ordering the S10+ . Last minute cancelled the order and purchased the OPPO F11 Pro.

Have to say I am very impressed and happy with the purchase. The camera is simply awesome, takes great pictures and in absolute darkness you can turn on the Light feature which is awesome.

The Fingerprint and Face recognition is very impressive as its very quick and responsive.

There are many other features you can turn on like when you phone is locked just make an 'O' to turn the camera on or making a 'V' to turn the flashlight on. This is very handy when you quickly need a light or get your Camera on without really having the need to unlock your phone.

I am glad I bought the OPPO F11 Pro. Very Happy with the Purchase.

It's only been a week and I am still exploring.

Cheers

Product is as described in functionality and design. Battery life is almost two days with normal usage and web browsing and average 4 hour YouTube video play. Face recognition and finger print scanner is very responsive and fast. Low light and day light photography is very impressive and captivating. No heating issue while using or watching videos ,nor in using as hotspot. Vooc charging is just superb. Within 10 minutes of charge it get upto 40 percent from 20 percent. It takes 1 hour 20 minutes for a 100 percent. Screen sensitivity and responsiveness is awesome. Sound is also louder crispy and clear. No issues detected so far after 48 hours of use. Value for money product.

Aswm phone....worth investing fr this one , fabulous performance ,crazy cam , very happy with device but .....was very unhappy with delivery guy.. disconnected my calls several times ,very rude behavior with customes(worst behavior while addressing customer and no word of Punctuality in delivering product on time )....other no complaints with Amazon services....
camera is not good as they said

I was looking for a good phone almost which should fit in my budget for 6 months and finally found this product. After using it for a month, i'm writing this review.
Immediate thought when someone asks me on 'How's the new mobile'. --> It's worth the money.
Pros
Rear Camera is good & Low light photography is also great
Processor is Fast, sometimes you may feel a little lagging though
Battery life is almost 1 day with heavy usage
Front camera is too good
Android features are good
No heating issue found so far
Fast charging. 5 mins of charging is equal to 30 to 40%

Cons
Pone is Heavy
Speaker is not good
If you are not a fan of Hybrid slot, add that as a Cons...

Overall phone is worth the price and you will feel happy at end of the day..
Not use charger missing

Battery charging is awesome better than previous VOOC ( I was using oppo f3 plus earlier).

Batter is lasting for good amount of time.

Cameras are good. UI is nice. NO heating issues. Face recognition is very prompt with raising camera.I am loving the phone a lot.

Awesome camera. Light weight and slim phone. Exceptional features in reasonable price. Has nice look. The touch is smooth.

EXCELLENT QUALITY WORK BY OPPO AND FAST DELIVERY BY AMAZON. I BOUGHT THISPHONE AT THE PRICE OF 13500 EXCHANGING REDMI NOTE 5 PRO AT PRICE OF 9500 AND ALSO GETTING SOME ADDITIONAL DISCOUNT. JUST BUY IT ITS AWESOME
Not a good quality phone as per my experience , phone chipset got crashed in 20 days , though I got the replacement but the trust is lost . Oppo Spend less on advertisement more on product Quality

Oppo has done a super fine job with this one! It has an amazing screen to body ratio, brilliant battery and awesome cameras. The most iconic feature is obviously the front pop up camera tech. Its super cool to use it, especially for face unlock. The Color OS feels smooth and easy to operate. I got a security patch of May within 15 mins of switching it on. The build quality is fantastic. The Aurora Green is way more good looking than the black variant. You will love the performance of Mediatek's P70. I know it cant be compared with Snapdragon ones but why should we? P70 is way more powerful than SD 660 and has better benchmark scores than SD 675. This processor effortlessly manages the image processing and gives you super fast results from the 48 mp back camera. Never underestimate Mediatek anymore! Use the F11 Pro and feel the power yourself.

Looks and design is the 1st thing that caught my eyes, Aurora Green colour is a very beautiful shade; looks appealing to eyes- subtle yet gorgeous. Then I liked every aspect of this phone. Only thing I didn't like is that the back side of the phone is getting so many fingerprint marks if u don't use the phone with clean hands. So I could see many fingerprint marks on the back side, so need to clean it everyday. Whereas in a Fon with glass back like Huawei and Redmi note 7, 7pro it looks all clean everytime, marks,impressions don't show up much.
But this not a very big disadvantage. It will rarely bother anyone. I just felt to include this point. I would rate this phone 8.5/10
Coz it's a little bit heavy than other competitors. Otherwise I have just fallen in love with this phone 😍🥰 Definitely go for it.

Everything is just Awesome!!!
Just got it in 16 hours of ordering in rural area...what an excellent service by Amazon!! Hats off!!!
Pros-
Excellent Cameras
Superfast charging and great battery backup
No Heating Issue at continuous 14 hours usage
Immersive panormic Display
Fast Charger, Earphones, BackCover and screen guard all available in box only...no need to spend a single penny
Excellent gaming performance in PUBG and Asphalt
Great looks and pop up camera is awesome and fast

Cons-
Polycarbonate back (But it is better than metal or glass because metal heats a lot and glass is very fragile and also heats a lot in indian conditions)

No Type-C Port- Who cares... Type C is an hype which is created by YouTubers. In present conditions micro USB be much better because most of the devices comes with micro USB support only and Type C technically not so improved now.
Ok

Im an oppo user since Oppo f1... This is my 5th oppo phone.. but I'm not fully satisfied with it's performance. After 3months of use I found that it give a good battery life as compared with all other phones i used and it's charging is superb.
I'm totally unsatisfied with it's popup camera. Facelock is not easy with pop-up cameras. More than that while camera going back it makes a knock sound. I checked it with Oppo authorized service center,the said it may due to dust they cleaned and given it back I checked at that time. Hope it is cleared. But next day onwards it started again.... Totally unsatisfied with pop-up camera.. rest everything is fine.. I'm giving 3* only because of worst pop-up cam.

So friends this is my first oppo big budget phone I am writing this after one weeks of usage ..Amazing phone , pictures quality excellent anytime u click, battery life very good if u put under notification in off mode,I am using this phone for photography and this phone serve my purpose very well..rest everything is good..go for it..

After 1 day of heavy use have noticed few things which I will like to highlight.
1. The phone looks good and rich
2. The vooc charging is supercool it charges the phone in just 45 mins from 30 to 100%
3. Pubg is running like butter
4. 128GB storage is very sufficient
5. The camera I think is not so good when you talk about 48mega pixels than the photo should also match the pixels so I think 48mega pixel is not doing it's job....no no to back camera
6. Front camera is fine
7. I think oppo should work more on camera and on the weight of the phone

Rest you can enjoy playing pubg with vooc charging facility....

Good camera takes very detailed pictures. No type c port charger but charges very quickly and lost longer. Processing speed is good enough for daily or rough usage. Played pubg on this device with HD graphics with high frame rate for 2 and a half hours and I didn't face any lag hardly faced any frame drop. Gameplay was smooth. While playing pubg, mobile is not getting heated up much and battery also only less than 40 percent consumed for the two and a half hours game play with HD graphics. Overall good phone at this price. Would recommend it.

But still there pop camera and sensors making it good, also you never disappointed with there features. And there fast charging work really well. Camera is also fantastic.
100% recommended

But some point to be noted # Oppo India :-
Cons:-
1. Heating issue when surfing the Internet and video call .
2. Back Panel is Easily Scratch-able, Even Dust particle create a big scratch easily. So please cover the back panel through scratch resistance guard.
3. Screen is very good but if oppo provide Amoled panel , it was a super deal for his true followers.
4. Finger print photography not include in colors os 6 . It is Basic feature for any mobile, Please update this feature in next update.
5. Back cover which is provide in the Box is very cheap quality, it is not a dust resistance, Dust particle is always on the back cover. and color is very dull , The beauty of the phone is cover from this cover.
6. you tube notification is not clear from pop up window.
Pros:-
1. Night photo-graphy is ver good in this phone, Night Mode is very good from other device which is in the market.
2. Full screen & bezel less display is Trendy and future of the Mobile industry.
3. pop- up camera is very good to see and pic is super.
4. 48 mp camera is good but if F11 pro use Sony sensor , this phone was one step upper compare to other market.
5. Back Design is superb , it is very good compare to vivo.
6. pop up camera position is very good to see and very pleasant to eyes.
7. fast charging is very fast, vooc is a racket.

Overall phone is very good with latest phenomena of mobile industry.
And I think Heating issue will be solved in future through Software Update.

Get heated up very fast

Inside the box we get some paperwork a micro USB cable and a charging brick which is rated at 5V 4A and it's very fast. We also get a silicon case for the phone, so that's good

It has a hybrid SIM slot which means you can add 2 SIM card or 1 SIM+1 SD card. Sadly opportunity has gone with a micro USB slot for charging, at this price point we expect a type C port. It supports VOOC fast charge so it's good.

A great smartphone at this price. The cameras are just amazing and the photos are good and clear, but the low light photography could be improved.

It has a very powerful processor the Helios p70, great for multi-tasking gaming and normal usage. It has 6 gigs of ram, which is enough for 2019 and is also somewhat futureproof

It runs on colour OS 6 based on Android pie which is fast responsive and optimised. And you also get a game space feature which can be use to boost gaming performance and block calls or notifications

Talking about the storage, it has 64 gigs of storage. It's okay but, they should have gone with 128 gigs instead.

Overall it's a great phone with some flaws like micro USB.

This is My first time writing a review on any product, my apologies for any mistakes or missing something in the review.

I was using the Vivo V9 for almost 9 months and something did not add quiet well. Most of the time the Phone was not going what its supposed to do with the configuration it had. I was planning for an upgrade, POCO F1 , Vivo V15pro or Oppo F11 pro. These were the phones that I considered to go for...

After a lot of comparisons and considerations I ordered the F11 pro. Phone's first impression itself was awesome😍. The Thunder black color is superb. Though the phone's body is of Plastic, you will never feel the same. The glossy finish and mirror like back panel will give you guys a rich feel ( both the back panel and touch panel will welcome a lot of fingerprints and smudge).

ColorOS 6 based on the latest Android version 9 runs smoothly with the 6gigs RAM. I guarantee you guys, you are not going to feel any Kinda lag while using this beautyful beast.

4000mAh battery holds great with the daily usage and Gives you guys an ample hours of backup while you watch online movies or play any games ( so far I've played PUBG, NFS underground, Asphalt 9 and COD without any issues and I've enjoyed the gaming experience this phone can offer)

Coming to the camera point of view, F11 pro is equipped with 48mp+5mp dual camera in the back and a 16mp Pop-up Selfie unit. I am not a selfie freak so I can only tell you guys the front shooter does good job. You can customize the Pop-up camera sound (popup and popdown sound) through the setting and the sound out of this world(something like an 👽). The dual camera setup in the back will help you guys to capture pretty decent shoots in the day light and low light scenarios but night shoots are not much impressive. ( Added some pics)

Phone is So quick interms of both face unlock as well as finger.

Speaker quality is good and loud ( not too much)
Earpiece produce decent amount of volume but sometimes I felt like it's auditable even if the Speaker phone is not enabled.

With that being said, if you guys are looking for a phone which can handle heavy gaming and take awesome pictures and not wanted to be bothered with any notches you guys can go for this beautiful beast.

Happy with usage, battery and performance. My performance includes WhatsApp and Surfing Mainly. For other things, I have iPhone X. However not happy with the back. The back is slippery and I thought it would be metal. They said its a glass but it all feels Plastic. Using phone since 3 weeks, there are already back scratches from normal office usage. I usually plan to use phone without cover. Heck what is the fun of 3 color gradient if one has to use cover. The cover they have provided gives pretty cheap feeling and it gets all oily maybe because of Delhi Summer. I would had been satisfied if this was sub 15k phone but when spending around 24k, I expect premium metallic feeling. Maybe they spent all money on no-notch screen maybe that is why other things were compromised including the processor. ..

I would love to sell this phone if anyone want to purchase and buy something else. Coming from Redmi Note 5 Pro 6GB ... Metal feeling is totally missing

If you are looking for a phone in range of 20k,then oppo f11 pro will satisfy you more than any other mobile. The rising camera is an added beauty for this mobile which is really stunning in both looks and taking pictures. Battery capacity and stand by time is far better. The notch less display will help you view vidoes with more comfort and negligible interference. The vooc charger provided also works well. We have many mobiles with distinct or same features as this mobile has with a higher price, but apart from all of these OPPO F11 PRO do satisfy you in an affordable price. Thank you OPPO (The Official Indian Cricket Team Sponsor).

Get heated up very fast

Inside the box we get some paperwork a micro USB cable and a charging brick which is rated at 5V 4A and it's very fast. We also get a silicon case for the phone, so that's good

It has a hybrid SIM slot which means you can add 2 SIM card or 1 SIM+1 SD card. Sadly opportunity has gone with a micro USB slot for charging, at this price point we expect a type C port. It supports VOOC fast charge so it's good.

A great smartphone at this price. The cameras are just amazing and the photos are good and clear, but the low light photography could be improved.

It has a very powerful processor the Helios p70, great for multi-tasking gaming and normal usage. It has 6 gigs of ram, which is enough for 2019 and is also somewhat futureproof

It runs on colour OS 6 based on Android pie which is fast responsive and optimised. And you also get a game space feature which can be use to boost gaming performance and block calls or notifications

Talking about the storage, it has 64 gigs of storage. It's okay but, they should have gone with 128 gigs instead.

Overall it's a great phone with some flaws like micro USB.

.
Have issues with voice recognition, transmission and not audible to the opposite party..

I don't know if I was sent a defective piece or if the camera quality is just like that in this model.. But rear camera is not very good. Selfie camera is working fine with enough light. The rear camera is not up-to the mark. Oppo is marketing this model for lovely low light pictures.. But my one plus 5 that I have used before this was really better than this. Face recognition was fair enough. Battery life is also fair enough. Charge time is fast too. I'm utterly disappointed with the rear camera of the phone.

Pros :
1) Camera good quality
2) Good low light pictures
3) Speed of the phone is good
4) Face recognition is fast
5) Charging is fast and battery lasts longer

Cons :
1) Selfie looks artificial
2) Phone is thicker as compared to other phone in same category (may be because of selfie camera)

Overall, phone is good but in this price band.

Thank you

Switching over from Samsung was very Difficult as I was using for many years. Was very close to ordering the S10+ . Last minute cancelled the order and purchased the OPPO F11 Pro.

Have to say I am very impressed and happy with the purchase. The camera is simply awesome, takes great pictures and in absolute darkness you can turn on the Light feature which is awesome.

The Fingerprint and Face recognition is very impressive as its very quick and responsive.

There are many other features you can turn on like when you phone is locked just make an 'O' to turn the camera on or making a 'V' to turn the flashlight on. This is very handy when you quickly need a light or get your Camera on without really having the need to unlock your phone.

I am glad I bought the OPPO F11 Pro. Very Happy with the Purchase.

It's only been a week and I am still exploring.

Cheers

Product is as described in functionality and design. Battery life is almost two days with normal usage and web browsing and average 4 hour YouTube video play. Face recognition and finger print scanner is very responsive and fast. Low light and day light photography is very impressive and captivating. No heating issue while using or watching videos ,nor in using as hotspot. Vooc charging is just superb. Within 10 minutes of charge it get upto 40 percent from 20 percent. It takes 1 hour 20 minutes for a 100 percent. Screen sensitivity and responsiveness is awesome. Sound is also louder crispy and clear. No issues detected so far after 48 hours of use. Value for money product.

Aswm phone....worth investing fr this one , fabulous performance ,crazy cam , very happy with device but .....was very unhappy with delivery guy.. disconnected my calls several times ,very rude behavior with customes(worst behavior while addressing customer and no word of Punctuality in delivering product on time )....other no complaints with Amazon services....
camera is not good as they said

I was looking for a good phone almost which should fit in my budget for 6 months and finally found this product. After using it for a month, i'm writing this review.
Immediate thought when someone asks me on 'How's the new mobile'. --> It's worth the money.
Pros
Rear Camera is good & Low light photography is also great
Processor is Fast, sometimes you may feel a little lagging though
Battery life is almost 1 day with heavy usage
Front camera is too good
Android features are good
No heating issue found so far
Fast charging. 5 mins of charging is equal to 30 to 40%

Cons

Speaker is not good
If you are not a fan of Hybrid slot, add that as a Cons...

Overall phone is worth the price and you will feel happy at end of the day..

Display is super cool. i compared v15 pro and f11 pro both in hands n i felt f11 pro display more crisp and vivid. and rear cam of f11 pro outshines in nightmode specially..
vooc 3.0 charges my phone in 75min.
the only thing i gave 4star is its build quality its color is easily coming out from edges and frame by minor usage and scratches which is plastic so i dont like my new phone's color to come out so soon.
Not use charger missing

I have received the phone on 18.3.19. Have been using for last 2 days.

Battery charging is awesome better than previous VOOC ( I was using oppo f3 plus earlier).

Batter is lasting for good amount of time.

Cameras are good. UI is nice. NO heating issues. Face recognition is very prompt with raising camera.I am loving the phone a lot.

Camera: In an oppo shared article I read the sensor used in oppo f11 pro is the same Sony sensor IMX586 which they used in Redmi Note 7 pro. Looks like the news is for real. Camera quality from rear and front is top notch. Natural colors, Outstanding details, Perfect HDR shots and a easy friendly camera UI. The pop-up camera technology is too good to see. Its fast and works quietly.
Is not good
I'm sorry to say this is very poor product by oppo please don't buy it vooc charger not working after few days

I was a little sceptical buying oppo again, having used F1 plus for 3 years, but this just proves oppo has definitely meaning business.

Also one of the security feature no one understands is that camera is hidden away and with all these privacy issues going on,you can be sure that no one is using your phone to look at you, coz camera is all tucked away.

1st of all thank you Amazon for your quuck delivery service. Oppo f11 pro is a very gd phone. Camera is excellent in day & low light. Battery quality is very good. Storage is the only issue in this phone, at the price of 25k oppo only provides 64gb rom & 2nd sim slot is hybrid. Processor should be little bit better at this range. I played pubg without any problem. Smooth as butter. If you get it in any offer which i get in a no cost emi the amount is only 17k with exchanging my 3yrs old phone. Which is a great deal for me. Go for it if u like to click great selfies & photos. Gaming is very good in this phone.
Back up is very poor..even in idle conditions battery draining .. Even no wifi or net connection .. And background apps disable.. Not suitable for backup..

The built is average. Camera is spectacular. Display is a compromise in quality. The back cover provided inside the case is the worst. Unlock speed is superb ( for face unlock and fingerprint ) Overall a good product at the given price range.

I purchased this product by simply paying 15000 Rs on mobile exchange mode. This was the first pruduent thing, I made in my life. The oppo F11 is a beautiful well designed with premium features. Battery is outstanding with fast charging. It took only 1 hour to charge from 0 to 90%. Face recognition is excellent. Screen quality and its durability are quite respectable. Any how the more you ready to pay, the more premium features you can avail. Overall I am completely satisfied with this product.
